creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: two panels stitched together with thread in cream and purples; panels are predominately red with varying stripes in cream, grey and blue; left panel woven with two large quadrupeds, six smaller quadrupeds, four birds and two flower shapes; right panel woven with two large double-headed birds, four smaller birds and diamond and flower shapes; designs primarily in cream
title: Tzute
